title: Super juicy rock cakes
ingredients: ['100g raisins or sultanas', '100g dried apricots, chopped', '50g mixed citrus peel, chopped', '50g dried cranberries', '450g self-raising flour', '1/2 tablespoon ground nutmeg', '200g butter', '200g demerara sugar', '2 medium free-range eggs, beaten', 'sugar for sprinkling']
